message:
I was looking for how to use NDK on Android Studio ... .at last I could make it... the following link was really very useful
http://www.shaneenishry.com/blog/2014/08/17/ndk-with-android-studio/
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
main points to remmeber:
1- add NDK path in local.properties 
2- add NDK Home variable in System Env.
3- in build.gardle define the module that is written in c ndk {} and define sourceSets.main {}
